QuestData.Title: Throwing Shade
QuestData.Description: That was Locus-Walker. He taught me all that I know about the Void, and he still has more to teach me.$b$bIf he is here, then the ethereals' presence only intrigues me further. I had thought him the only one of his kind, but now that I have seen another tangling with the Void...$b$bCome, we must play his game if we want to learn what he knows. He appears to have gone toward the Umbra Hollows to the north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Umbra Hollows with Alleria and Locus-Walker.
